com.localytics.android

Class InboxCampaign

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.localytics.android.Campaign
      • com.localytics.android.WebViewCampaign
        • com.localytics.android.InboxCampaign
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.os.Parcelable

    public final class InboxCampaign
extends WebViewCampaign
    The campaign class containing information relevant to a single inbox campaign. Also includes push to inbox campaigns (getCampaignId() in that case is a push campaign id).

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from interface android.os.Parcelable

        android.os.Parcelable.ClassLoaderCreator<T>, android.os.Parcelable.Creator<T>

      • isRead

        public boolean isRead()
        Get the inbox campaign read/unread state. This flag can be used to indicate the UI status.
        Returns:
        true if the inbox campaign is read, otherwise false.

      • isVisible

        public boolean isVisible()
        Get the state of whether or not this campaign should be displayed.
        Returns:
        true if the Inbox campaign has a non-blank title

      • isDeleted

        public boolean isDeleted()
        Get the state of whether or not this campaign is deleted.
        Returns:
        true if the Inbox campaign has been deleted

      • isPushToInboxCampaign

        public boolean isPushToInboxCampaign()
        Returns yes if a push to inbox campaign
        Returns:
        true if the Inbox campaign originated from a push message.

      • setRead

        public void setRead(boolean read)
        Set the inbox campaign read/unread state. Setting this flag will also update the Localytics database with the appropriate value
        Parameters:
        read - true if the inbox campaign is read, otherwise false
